name: mm-swarm
description: MagicMirror/MMPM Docker Cluster with shared resources
author: Andres Vanegas <ukab72106@gmail.com>

scripts.prebuild: npm run lint:fix && rm -fr build/node_modules build/package-lock.json
scripts.build: docker build --platform=linux/amd64 --build-arg MM_BRANCH="master" --build-arg MM_REPO_OWNER="MagicMirrorOrg" -f build/Dockerfile -t andresvanegas/mm-swarm --compress --push build
scripts.build:dev: docker build --platform=linux/amd64 --build-arg MM_BRANCH="weatherapi" --build-arg MM_REPO_OWNER="angeldeejay" -f build/Dockerfile -t andresvanegas/mm-swarm --compress --push build
scripts.build_local: docker build --platform=linux/amd64 --build-arg MM_BRANCH="master" --build-arg MM_REPO_OWNER="MagicMirrorOrg" -f build/Dockerfile -t andresvanegas/mm-swarm build
scripts.build_local:dev: docker build --platform=linux/amd64 --build-arg MM_BRANCH="weatherapi" --build-arg MM_REPO_OWNER="angeldeejay" -f build/Dockerfile -t andresvanegas/mm-swarm build
scripts.clean: docker container prune -f; docker network prune -f; docker volume prune -f
scripts.foreground_local: docker build --platform=linux/amd64 --build-arg MM_BRANCH="master" --build-arg MM_REPO_OWNER="MagicMirrorOrg" -f build/Dockerfile -t andresvanegas/mm-swarm build && docker-compose up --force-recreate --no-build --remove-orphans -t 0
scripts.foreground_local:dev: docker build --platform=linux/amd64 --build-arg MM_BRANCH="weatherapi" --build-arg MM_REPO_OWNER="angeldeejay" -f build/Dockerfile -t andresvanegas/mm-swarm build && docker-compose up --force-recreate --no-build --remove-orphans -t 0
scripts.debug: npm run build_local && node index.js --debug && docker-compose up --no-build --remove-orphans -t 0
scripts.prestart: npm run postinstall; npm run clean
